=> •ᴄâᴜ ʙị độɴɢ:
- S +V (hiện tại) + O
-> S + is/am/are +V (p2)
- S + is/am/are + V-ing + O
-> S + am/is/are + being + V(p2)
- S + has/have + V(p2)
-> S + has/have + been + V(p2)
- S + V(ed) + O
-> S + was/were + V(ed)
- S + had + V(p2) + O
-> S + had been + V(p2)
- S + will + V
-> S + will be + V(p2)
- S + will have + V(p2)
-> S + will have been + V(p2)
- S + may/can/must... + V
-> S + may/can/must.. + be V(p2)
- S + make/let + sb + V
-> S + be made to + V
- S + have sb do sth
-> S + have + sth done
• ᴄâᴜ so sáɴʜ:
- so sánh hơn
tính từ ngắn:
        S1 + be + adj(-er) + than + S2
tính từ dài:
        S1 + be + more + adj + than + S2
- so sánh bằng
        S1 + be + as + adj + as + S2
-so sánh nhất
tính từ ngắn:
         the + adj(-est)
tính từ dài:
         the most + adj
